segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical domestic setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light, showing the garden nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, handling a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, basin full, water starting to spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her foot on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinet with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a step stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool looks unsteady, leaning back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm up as if asking for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating without the woman knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's an everyday moment with some unexpected elements.
segments.speaker: PAR
